name: 翁頌舜
objective: 資料探勘與知識發現課程的目的在學習應用資料探勘技術、知識發現技術與資料倉儲概念，從企業資料庫中，探勘出對提升企業競爭力有幫助的知識。課程內容包含下列主題: 1.資料探勘與知識發現概論 2.資料探勘技術於資料庫與資料倉儲的應用 3.關聯法則探勘 4.分類 5.群集分析 6.文件探勘 7.資料探勘在企業的應用 8. 資料探勘的各種研究領域 9. 資料探勘軟體實作。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction: What is Data Mining?
Week 2: Approaches to Data Mining
Week 3: Data Mining Techniques: Association Rule Mining
Week 4: Data Mining Techniques: Association Rule Mining
Week 5: Data Mining Techniques: Classification and Prediction
Week 6: Data Mining Techniques: Classification and Prediction
Week 7: Data Mining Techniques: Classification and Prediction
Week 8: Data Mining Techniques: Cluster Analysis
Week 9: Data Mining Techniques: Cluter Analysis
Week 10: 期中實作報告
Week 11: Data Preparation and preprocessing.
Week 12: IBM 資料探勘軟體實作 (1)
Week 13: IBM 資料探勘軟體實作 (2)
Week 14: IBM 資料探勘軟體實作 (3)
Week 15: IBM 資料探勘軟體實作 (4)
Week 16: Text Mining and Mining Complex Data
Week 17: Applications and Trends in Data Mining
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. 課堂出席與參與 30%
2. 隨堂測試 10%
3. 報告與作業繳交 20%
4. 期末考試  40%
materials:
1.“Introduction to Data Mining", 2006, Author: Pang-Ning Tan, Michael Steinbach, Vipin Kumar, Publisher: Addison Wesley.
2.“Data Mining, Concepts and Techniques", 2011, 3rd Edition, Jiawei Han & Michael Kamber, Publisher: Morgan Kaufmann.
